---
title: "strategy_model"
format: pdf
---

```{r}
full_model <- glm(won~., family = binomial,data = strategy)
full_summary <- summary(full_model)
```

```{r}
coefs <- data.frame(full_summary$coefficients)
sign_coefs <- coefs %>% 
  filter(`Pr...z..` <= 0.1) %>% 
  select(c(Estimate,`Pr...z..`)) %>% 
  arrange(`Pr...z..`)
sign_coefs
```
```{r}
coefs %>% select(`Pr...z..`) %>% 
  arrange(desc(`Pr...z..`))
```

```{r}
model_forward <- step(glm(won ~ 1, data = strategy, family = binomial),
                      scope = full_model, direction = "forward")

model_forward
```
